name: Kenney Collector VR
description:
Submission for the Kenney Jam 2021 made with the Godot game engine. Theme is rotation. We accomplish this theme by having the player rotate cubes to press a button. For each cube the player is rewarded with 1 Kenney asset. There are 50 unique Kenney assets to discover!

This is a VR project. There is no way to play this without a headset. It should work with any Windows headset however we only have controllers mapped for Vive and Oculus Rift. It will also work on Oculus Quest and Quest 2.

Open source on Github: https://github.com/Troy-Story-Games/rotation-station
